pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Nive application base packageThis is the base package.## Source codeThe source code is hosted on github: https://github.com/nive### The form module nive.components.reformThe reform package is a merge of deform and colander and includes several changesto make form handling easier. Please see nive.components.reform.README.txt for details.### TranslationsTranslations can be extracted using lingua>=3.2> pip install lingua-3.2> bin/pot-create -o nive/locale/nive.pot nive### Dependencieslibrary 'pillow' 10> optional. required for extensions.images.
